https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5855wwOnhlfK2cBHwA46KCwVFva.jpg Aurora Teagarden and her boyfriend Martin are thrilled when they get an unexpected visit from his niece and her new baby. Their excitement is short lived when his niece disappears and the baby is left behind. Once again, Aurora finds herself drawn into a deadly investigation as she risks it all to help Martin reunite with his family. A Bundle of Trouble: An Aurora Teagarden Mystery
